Title: OpenGraph .NET
Description:
A C# client for the Facebook Graph API.  Supports desktop, web, ASP.NET MVC, and Silverlight connections and real-time updates.

PLEASE NOTE: I discovered an issue with Post objects last night and have uploaded a new version, 0.9.1.1.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
A C# client for the Facebook Graph API. Supports desktop, web, ASP.NET MVC, and Silverlight connections and real-time updates.

PLEASE NOTE: I discovered an issue with Post objects last night and have uploaded a new version, 0.9.1.1.

Pre-release documentation is currently available at http://robpaveza.net/opengraph.net/docs/
